name: Tikia The Timeless
description:
A mysterious gang calling themselves "The  TimeSkippers" has stolen a time travel prototype! Equipped with a rebuilt prototype, robotic housekeeper-turned-crimefighter Tikia is determined to follow them through time, be it into the past, back to the present, and towards the future.
However, the prototype's unfinished nature leaves her stranded and with bizarre time-freezing abilities! Use your movement together with these new abilities to find the energy crystals you need to be able to travel through time again and keep up the chase! 

The game is currently only playable with a controller.

Asset credits:
Tutorial music is "Unnamed" by Ifrit
Stage music is modified "Fun is Infinite at AGM" by northivanastan
Results music is "Nonchalant Day" by tapatilorenzo
Sound effects obtained and modified from zapsplat.com
Uses "Metal Grate" by GoldenThumbs
Uses "Free Controller Prompts - Xbox, Playstation, Switch, PC" by Terazilla
Other textures obtained from polyhaven.com and ambientcg.com

All other assets made by David Gómez.
